name: Immortal Rising
description:
Grow your immortal beyond the limits and defeat true evil!
Grow your immortal through various growth content and enjoy the stylish skills and controls.

- Experience simple, easy, and rapid growth in idle RPG
- Farm various goods to achieve growth
- Combine your skills and equipment and strategically use the skill system to get stronger
- Enthralling skill animation and effects for each weapon class
- Grow along with other users through guild content
- Compete with countless users and get rewarded through PvP content
